items.sentence: I don\'t think I\'ve ever done anything that would cause my parents to want to punish me.
English is quite often the language of choice when speaking to an international audience.
Tom kept tailgating the car in front of us even though I told him it was unsafe to do so.
Tom found someone\'s business card in his pocket, but couldn\'t remember where he got it.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom showed up at the party because Mary told me he\'d be coming.
Even though it\'s against company policy, Tom and Mary kiss and hug every time they meet.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom would be interested in buying your old MP3 player.
Tom was a vegetarian until his doctor told him he should probably start eating meat, too.
Tom and Mary got married three years ago, but only stayed married for about three months.
If you want to be fluent in French, you\'ll need to study much harder than you have been.
Tom couldn\'t believe that he was going out with one of the best looking girls at school.
Tom is colorblind, so he couldn\'t tell if Mary was wearing a green dress or a red dress.
I wonder whether or not Tom bought that house on Park Street he was looking at last week.
I almost agreed to do that, but then I remembered what happened the last time I did that.
You didn't really think that you were going to be able to do that by yourselves, did you?
Tom has done a lot of stupid stuff, but I don't think he'd ever do something that stupid.
Tom was really tired. He turned off the light at nine and was fast asleep within minutes.
Whenever I hear this song, I think about the first dance I went to when I was a teenager.
In front of the water fountain, there was a young woman accompanying herself on a guitar.
They say that in America anyone can become president, but perhaps that's not really true.
